principle investment will give you protection for up to a drop in each individual name and offer maximum upside potential of for each stock in the basket over a two year time period Feel free to call or email with any questions All the best Greg Manning Potfolio RANGERS REDpdf Greg Manning Senior Vice President Lehman Brothers Toll Free This information has been obtained from various sources we do not represent that this information including but not limited to prices quotes and statistics is complete or accurate and it should not be relied on as such All information is subject to change
